data.title: Kristine Hermosa family: Husband, kids, sister, wedding
data.meta_description: KRISTINE HERMOSA FAMILY is the envy of most people in the Philippines. This write up highlights some of the highlights and info about these top celebs.
data.text:
Kristine Hermosa family comprises of four gorgeous kids and their father - Oyo Boy Sotto. Kristine spends most of her time with her husband and children. If not travelling, the couple bonds in their home or at their café.

Kristine Hermosa family is picture-perfect. Most families strive to look as good and be as happy. Here is everything you need to know about her family.

Profile summary

Full birth name: Kristine Hermosa

Profession: Actress

Date of birth: 9/9/1983

Age: 36

Birthplace: Quezon City, Philippines

Nationality: Filipino

Ethnicity: Filipino

Gender: Female.

Religion: Christianity.

Zodiac sign: Virgo

Ex-husband name: Diether Ocampo

Children: Four

Weight: 83.9 - 102.5 kg

Height: 6 feet & inches

Hair color: Brown

Eyes olor: Black

Net worth (approx.): $58 Million

Early life

Kristine Hermosa family is multi-racial. Her mother is Spanish, and her father is Filipino. She was born on born on 9th September 1983. The actress has three other siblings. She is the second child. Hermosa, which is the stage name she uses, is her mother’s maiden name which translates to beautiful.

She has not shared much about where she comes from and her relatives. However, Kristine Hermosa sister, Kathleen, is also an actress. The two have had the interest of acting from the time they were young.

Career

She is known for her acting roles in soap operas. Some of the films she has featured in are Pangako Sa ’Yo. Her Tandem where she played Ynamorata “Yna”, Garcia in Sana’y Waka Nabf Wakas where she played Ara, and Alferoros in Dahil May Isang Ikaw where she played the role of Angela. She has featured in many films that have been aired internationally.

READ ALSO: Kylie Verzosa bio: age, height, net worth, parents

Kristine Hermosa wedding

The actress's first wedding with ex-husband Diether Ocampo was on 21st September 2004. The wedding was annulled on 30th January 2009.

The top actress and Vittorio Mari Bonnevie tied the knot on 12th January 2011. Vittorio is an actor-comedian. The couple has been together since then. You can find Kristine Hermosa family photos online to get a glimpse of the beautiful wedding ceremony she had.

Oyo Boy Sotto and Kristine Hermosa family

The celebrity couple has an adopted son named Kiel. They also have three other children together Ondrea, Kaleb, and Valentine. Kristine Hermosa kids are four, and they get along well with each other. This is despite the fact that the first of Kristine Hermosa children is not her biological son.

Kristine Hermosa family pictures highlight how she enjoys family time. Kristine and the husband try to do as much as they can around the house. Show that both she and the husband enjoy family time. They prefer getting things done as opposed to hiring house helps and cleaners.

Kristine Hermosa family life is essential to her thus the reason she ensures that she finds time to spend with the husband and kids. The couple also takes parenting lessons to help them with the raising of the children. Kristine Hermosa family picture highlights her as more than an actress. She is hardworking and on the ground when it comes to family and the things that matter.

Source: KAMI.com.gh
